sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../css/Compliment.css'; // Import the CSS file for the component const Compliment = () => { const compliments = [ "I love when you throw your head back when you laugh.", "I don't mind when you laugh at me because I get to hear you laugh.", "I pause to admire you when you smile, so I'll throw a million jokes however shitty they are just to see you smile.", "You're a good listener", "I take your compliments at face value because your opinion is the only one that matters to me", "It is admirable and even sexy how much effort you put into your work", "I love that you forget stuff so I can be the one that remembers for you", "I like that you're incredibly good in every game that I've played with you, even if you hadn't practiced before.. Or maybe I just really suck", "I like your face, I think it's perfect.", "God really took their time when they were making you", "I hope you know you were my sexual awakening", "I like that you take care of how you look", "I love when you put on thick eyeliner", "I love when you put on thin eyeliner", "I love the fact that you always smell good, even when you sweat, you smell like perfume so I never know if you actually sweated", "I love your straight hair", "I love your wavy hair", "I love your dyed hair, it reminds me of old times", "I love your natural hair, it reminds me of how much you've grown", "I love the way you love", "I love how supportive you are", "You're the funniest person I know", "I love your eyebrows", "I love how perfect your lips are", "I love how soft your lips are", "I love that I can always tell when you've straightened your hair", "You're the smartest person I know", "You are the reason I've believed in a higher power again, because there is no way I met someone as amazing as you on accident.", "You always look sexy, even in your UAE shirt", "I like when you wear comfy clothes, I like to see you comfy", "You're always so adorable", "Being around you has always felt like home", "Thank you for being my home", "I love how you don't take bullshit from anyone", "Love your sister (had to include a budoor compliment, don't know how long it'll take you to reach this.)", "You're the reason I got into coding.", "You've changed my entire life", "You're the only person I love hanging out with", "Being with you doesn't feel like a chore", "I love cooking with you", "Your voice is enchanting", "I still sleep to our videos", "You'd make a great mother", "You are the most loving person I know", "You always manage to look stunning, no matter the occasion.", "You make me a better person.", " love how caring you are.", "You're my biggest supporter and cheerleader. Your belief in me gives me the strength to pursue my dreams", "You're extremely creative even though you don't think you are", "I believed your animations would be on billboards, and I was right.", "I love your hair", "I love how good your hair smells", "I love your eyes in the dark", "I love how your eyes twinle in the sun.", "You're an amazing singer and I wish you would sing more", "You're a fast learner, I was jealous of how good you were at it in such a short time.", "Whenever I hear you sing, it's like being transported to another world", "I love watching you work", "I love watching you eat", "I like that you're a slow eater, I wouldn't change that for the world", "I like that we balance each other out", "I appreciate how forgiving you are", "You're such a pervert when you're drunk, I love it", "I'm in awe of you", "I adore you", "Every song just makes me think of you.", "I love your name. It suits you." ]; const [currentCompliment, setCurrentCompliment] = useState(''); const [isShaking, setIsShaking] = useState(false); const generateCompliment = () => { const randomIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * compliments.length); const randomCompliment = compliments[randomIndex]; setCurrentCompliment(randomCompliment); setIsShaking(true); // Stop shaking after 500 milliseconds (adjust as needed) setTimeout(() => { setIsShaking(false); }, 500); }; return (

Compliment Jar

{currentCompliment}

); }; export default Compliment;
